flawed_nl_solution:
Roberto skips 70 times per minute because 4200 / 60 = <<4200/60=70>>70.
Together they skip 510 times a minute.
They will skip 7650 times because 510 x 15 = <<510*15=7650>>7650
#### 7650

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
